home.introduction: A real #Defi world to get reward everyday on your stake

about.title: What is YFIVE.FINANCE?
about.paragraphe1: YFIVE is a community driven DeFi-project by the people and for the people, the decisions and actions of YFIVE are made by its community through voting to assure equity and fairness for all.
about.paragraphe2: YFIVE.FINANCE is a new form of governance system, a think-tank where innovation, entrepreneurship, and technological advancements are the priority, creating a much needed utility focus to the blockchain space.
